scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: export TARGET=firefox && rimraf dist/firefox && npm run build:base
scripts.build:chrome: export TARGET=chrome && rimraf dist/chrome && npm run build:base
scripts.build:base: tsc && npm run build:scripts && vite build && npm run copy:fonts && node scripts/generate-icons.js && node scripts/update-version.js
scripts.build:scripts: BUILD_ENTRY=src/content/index.tsx BUILD_OUTPUT=content.js vite build --mode lib && BUILD_ENTRY=src/content/iframe-app.tsx BUILD_OUTPUT=iframe-app.js vite build --mode lib && BUILD_ENTRY=src/background/service-worker.ts BUILD_OUTPUT=background.js vite build --mode lib
